infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to capture photos for your travel journal.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app saves captured photos to your library and uploads them to your gallery.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to pick and save photos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Location is used to tag photos with where they were taken and show them on the map.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Location is used to tag photos with where they were taken and show them on the map.
